title: Lotta's Easter Surprise
description: From the author of Pippi Longstocking comes a story of Lotta, a charming five-year-old, who cannot imagine Easter without the chocolate eggs that the Easter bunny always brings. But, since the only candy store in town has closed for good, that is what may happen. Unless, of course, Lotta can save the day....
author: Astrid Lindgren
